Package it.uniroma1.metodologie2018.javabomber.powerups

Class TimerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.metodologie2018.javabomber.powerups.PowerUp
      • it.uniroma1.metodologie2018.javabomber.powerups.TimerUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, GraphicEntity
    public class TimerUp
extends PowerUp
    Aumenta il tempo a disposizione per la conclusione del match.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Ricci
